about_the_game:
Path of the Tank is an action-RPG where you can only play as a tank. But why? Why a tank and nothing else? Find out in this linear, story-driven and easy to pick up game that may remind you of a different time.

Gameplay features:

-Modernized old-school fighting in real-time
-Simple yet deep skill tree, with 5 powerful late-game options to freely choose
-Hunger mechanic; scavenge for food to survive!
-Wide variety of enemies from different fronts
-Upgradeable armor, potions and weapons
-Tons of secret areas that may contain more than simple loot
-Basic experience earning system. Defeat enemies and complete missions to gain xp!
-Lots of conversations with differents characters, some with a philosophical questioning.
-Locations to travel like dark crystaline caves, villages, ruins, dungeons, and, mostly, lushful forests!
-Long boss fights (you're a tank, you won't do much damage!)



Story:

Something went terribly wrong. Nature is completely altered; earth itself is coming to life, animals are scared and the spirits are restless. The balance of existance itself, which is key for the stability of life has been altered beyond recognition. It's not the first time that this has happened, and it won't be the last. The price that the rational and even the non-rational beings are paying in this world is heavy. Will you be able to stop this disaster? Of course you can. Otherwise no story would be told. But you're here to discover a lot more than that. Remove the nightmares of the innocent beings in this land, tank. Travel the path. Eat the path.



There's a lot of places to discover while traveling the path. Perhaps you could dig out some information out of your past too...? But most importantly...



Can you challenge oblivion itself?
